# Libraries

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
library(tidyverse)
library(pcaExplorer)
library(plotly)
library(gprofiler2)
library(GeneTonic)
library(pheatmap)
library(EnhancedVolcano)
})
```

# Set up directories

```{r}
result.dir <- "2024_03_15_results/"

if(!exists(result.dir)){
  dir.create(result.dir)
}
```

# Read in data

```{r}
gene.vector <- read.csv(file = '2024_03_08_results/HOS_OS17_shared_DE_genes.csv')
  # dplyr::filter(hos_padj < 0.000001 & os17_padj <0.000001) |> 
  # dplyr::select(gene_symbol) 

temp <- gene.vector$gene_symbol
```


Gene set enrichment

```{r}
enrich <- gost(temp,
               organism = "hsapiens",
               ordered_query = T,
               evcodes = T,
               custom_bg = NULL,
               sources = c("GO", "KEGG", "REAC"))
```
